dir-section.heading: Government
dir-section.p: The Government comprises members of Smer—Sociálna Demokracia (Smer-SD—Direction-Social Democracy), Hlas—Sociálna Demokracia (Hlas—Hlas Social Democracy) and the Slovenská Národná Strana (SNS—Slovakian National Party).
